gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all screen schemes to understand how screens are organized in my Jira projects.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all screen schemes with their details, including IDs, names, and descriptions.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new screen scheme to customize the issue view for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a JSON payload with the screen scheme details and return the created screen scheme's ID and confirmation of creation.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to delete an obsolete screen scheme to keep our project configuration clean.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified screen scheme and return a success message.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to update an existing screen scheme to reflect changes in our workflow requirements.
gold.ideal: The API should accept updated details for the screen scheme and return the updated screen scheme's information.
